meta.title: Ritual Text Related to the (Site) Deity

nodes.title: Ritual Text Related to the (Site) Deity
Description
nodes.body: Bod rgya tshig mdzod chen mo: dbang gi sta gon las/ sa yi lha mo sta gon gyi cho ga ni/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su sa'i lha bskyed nas ye shes pa bstims la/).

nodes.title: Example Texts
nodes.body: • Dpal 'khor lo sdom pa nag po pa'i sa chog sta gon gyi rim pa
